title.rendered: TTE is the official distributor of DORIN in the UAE

content.rendered:
TTE announces its partnership with Officine Mario Dorin Spa, a globally renowned brand that places itself as a reference manufacturer for the highest technological content perfect compressors. Owing to their decades-long and ongoing commitment to research, DORIN has a reputation for its reliable and environmentally conscious products. Going forward TTE will be the authorized distributors for DORIN in the region, offering a complete and diversified range of solutions suited for varied applications from supermarkets to transport, agri-food industries to pharmaceuticals.
 
Roshan Samuel, Associate Vice President, Trading Division and Praveen Meledath, Assistant Sales Manager – Sales & Estimation from TTE welcomed Mauro Bonfanti, Commercial Director, Officine Mario Dorin Spa, at the head office last week.
